sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.RiskCalculator</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Calculates a change request's risk and impact based on defined Risk Conditions</description> <name>RiskCalculator</name> <script><![CDATA[var RiskCalculator = Class.create(); RiskCalculator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(RiskCalculatorSNC, { type: 'RiskCalculator' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2009-03-27 00:49:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>454fe086c0a8ce0100586a71d9aaaefa</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>RiskCalculator</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Best Practice - Change Risk Calculator" source="com.snc.bestpractice.change_risk">6f6201c76d6620100acb70b3534330a2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_454fe086c0a8ce0100586a71d9aaaefa</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-07-10 08:55:38</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>133</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
